string-array.name: bicycle_tip
string-array.item: what\’s the My Wheels User Rating here?
spot in full view of people?
got a good quality lock – cable or D-lock, padlock and chain??
frame and both wheels locked to something immovable?
removed everything that can be taken – helmet, light, pump?
near a security camera or on-site staff?
if home – locked in garage or inside house?
